landing.projects: Welcome, I'm Charlie. A developer transitioning into game design, this is where I showcase my work. I also offer tutoring for aspiring web developers to master the basics of web development.

about.tutoring-title: Web Development Tutoring: Pay Only If You Understand!
about.tutoring: Struggling with the fundamentals of web development? Want to build a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, and Vanilla JavaScript? I offer customized tutoring designed to construct your knowledge from the ground up. Inspired by the educational philosophy of my rugby coach, I promise: if you don't understand after our session, that's on me. Interested? Send me a message on linkedin
about.Garden Connect description: Garden Connect develops websites for garden centers. Here I gained knowledge of Symfony, PHP, SQL, and Postman. Tasks included adding new features to the CMS and bug fixing.
about.Devoteam description: Devoteam is involved in Cloud, Integration, Data, and DevOps. I gained knowledge about integration consultancy here. It mainly consisted of REST APIs, AZURE, JAVA, and Mulesoft.
about.4BIS description: 4BIS has a varied income of projects that I could work on with support. A lot of knowledge about Nodejs, JQuery, and PHP was imparted to me here. I also learned a large part of my front-end skills here.
about.Winst description: Here I programmed functions in PHP and handled bugs.
about.Codam description: For 4 weeks, I participated in CODAM's 'Piscine' - a follow-up training for software engineers. The 'Piscine' (French for 'swimming pool') is a training and selection period of four weeks. During these weeks I worked on various projects in C. Thanks to this period, I realized that I wanted to delve into Game Design and Development.
about.Nova description: At Nova College, I was able to lay a foundation for starting in Web and app development.
